description: Creates a grant for the specified license. A grant shares the use of license entitlements with a specific Amazon Web Services account, an organization, or an organizational unit (OU). For more information, see Granted licenses in License Manager in the License Manager User Guide.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.

parameters.name: LicenseArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license.

parameters.name: Principals
parameters.description: The grant principals. You can specify one of the following as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN): An Amazon Web Services account, which includes only the account specified. An organizational unit (OU), which includes all accounts in the OU. An organization, which will include all accounts across your organization. (string) ---
